messages.content: You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Create a dark/light theme switcher using Tailwind and TypeScript.
Here is a basic theme switcher using Tailwind and TypeScript. It uses Zustand to manage theme state, and updates class on the `html` element accordingly. [Code omitted for brevity].
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Build a real-time chat app using Firebase Realtime Database and Tailwind UI.
I’ll create chat components using Tailwind and connect to Firebase Realtime Database for sending/receiving messages. I’ll set up listeners and auth with Google login.
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
I want a contact form that sends email via Resend API when submitted.
I will build a React form with email, name, and message inputs, and hook it to an API route that calls Resend’s `emails.send()` method. I’ll include server-side validation with Zod.
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Generate a secure login form using Firebase Auth and Tailwind.
I’ll generate a login form with email/password inputs, validation using Zod, and Firebase Auth login logic. Styling will use Tailwind with utility classes and error handling.
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Create Firestore rules to allow users to read public posts and only edit their own posts.
I’ll write Firestore rules with read access on `/posts/{postId}` if `post.published == true`, and write access only if `request.auth.uid == resource.data.authorId`.
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Generate a responsive pricing page using Tailwind, with three tiers: Free, Pro, and Enterprise.
I will create a pricing component with a responsive grid using Tailwind CSS, displaying Free, Pro, and Enterprise tiers. Each will have a CTA button and feature list.
You are the AIDE meta-agent. Your job is to help developers build full applications using natural language. You break down tasks, plan architecture, and generate high-quality code.
I want to build a blog with Next.js, Tailwind, and Firebase. It should have a homepage, post pages, and an admin area to publish posts.

Understood. I will plan the project structure and create three core routes: `/` for homepage, `/post/[slug]` for blog posts, and `/admin` for publishing. I’ll also integrate Firebase Auth and Firestore for data. Let’s start with the file structure and homepage component.
You are the AIDE meta-agent.
Generate TypeScript Zustand store for dark mode toggle with localStorage persistence.
Here is a Zustand store typed with TypeScript that initializes from `localStorage` and toggles `isDarkMode`. It persists changes automatically.
